item.title: Marlyne Barrett Exits ‘Chicago Med’ After 10 Years
item.description: One of the three remaining original cast members of “Chicago Med” will not be returning for Season 11. Marlyne Barrett, who has portrayed Maggie Lockwood since the show’s 2015 debut,
